answers.answer: my active hospital labor lasted 21hours! i didnt feel contractions till 12hours in, had to get epidural because i was going to or did fall into preeclampsia due to my blood pressure. although IV Pitocin made my babys heart rate decrease all it took was one push and she was out. ripped my vajay a little but it was worth it.  my bundle of joy is now 11months.
My water broke At 37w2d and had to get a csection because little man was breech! Lol a pretty short labor story but at least I experienced my water breaking!

I had to be induced, one because I was pre-eclamptic and two because my baby girl was so big. I was dialeted 1 centimeter when I went in  they had to break my water and gave me cervidial,and the next morning only went up to 2cnt. So they gave me pitosin, I didn't start to have consistent contractions until I was 4cnt, tried to get an epidural but it only took on one side. I made it to 6cnt and wouldn't go past that for 2hrs. My blood pressure skyrocketed and my baby girls heart rate was lowering so they took me back, put me under and within an hour I believe my daughter was born. 9pnds1oz 20 3/4 inches long. I was in labor all together for 18hrs.

Was in labor for two days. Had my son a day shy of 39 weeks. It was pretty bad the last couple of hours i had to get my membrane stripped because after a day and a half of early labor i was still at 1/2 a cm after she did that the contractions were more intense and within 4 hours i went to 8 cm had him at 1 am the next day. Pushin was pretty fast or at least it seemed since seeing him come out looked fast. He was 7lb 7oz

question: I would love to read some of your stores about labor and delivery and how it went ladies :-)
title: Labor and delivery stories :)
